night is the beginning of Shabbat and I
my tradition is on Friday nights to

through Friday from the Sabbath day
which is Friday night to Saturday night
so I light up this menorah the menorah
is all through the Scriptures it is
mentioned a number of times actually in

descriptions of the seven different

hallelujah lighting this up again so
this is the day of rest yah has made

this on Wednesday or Tuesday or Sunday
because yah said that this was the day
he sanctified the seventh day of the

indeed there is something very special

hallelujah so
continue to keep Sandy's dad in prayer
